Snapstock: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

General Questions

What is Snapstock?

Snapstock is a mobile application created for visual content enthusiasts. Here you can:

  • Browse thousands of inspiring images.
  • Create your own posts by sharing your photos and illustrations.
  • Organize your favorite posts into collections.
  • Like and add posts to favorites.
  • Interact with other users by leaving comments.
  • Contact technical support to resolve any issues.

How do I start using Snapstock?

  1. Download the app from Google Play.
  2. Create an account by entering your email address and password, or sign in through social media.
  3. Start browsing the feed filled with various images.
  4. Use the search and filter functions to find the content you’re interested in.
  5. Create your own posts, add images to collections, and interact with other users.

On which platforms is Snapstock available?

Currently, Snapstock is available on the Android platform. We are working on an iOS version, which will be released soon.

Is Snapstock free?

Yes, Snapstock is a free application. We do not charge for the use of the app\'s core features. In the future, we may offer additional paid features, but the basic functionality will always remain free.

Creating and Publishing Posts

How do I create a post?

  1. Click on the "Create Post" button.
  2. Select an image from your device\'s gallery or take a new photo.
  3. Add a description to the image using text, hashtags, and emojis.
  4. Choose a category for your post.
  5. Click on the "Publish" button.

How do I edit or delete my posts?

  1. Open your post.
  2. Click on the "Edit" or "Delete" button.
  3. Make the necessary changes or confirm the deletion.

Can I publish other people’s images?

We respect copyright laws. Please publish only your own images or images that you have permission to use.

Collections

What are collections?

Collections are a way to organize posts that you like. You can create collections on any topic, such as "Nature," "Animals," "Art," etc.

How do I create a collection?

  1. Click on the "Create Collection" button.
  2. Enter the name of the collection.
  3. Add a description (optional).
  4. Choose a cover image for the collection (optional).
  5. Click on the "Create" button.

How do I add a post to a collection?

  1. Open the post you want to add to a collection.
  2. Click on the "Add to Collection" button.
  3. Select a collection from the list.

How do I remove a post from a collection?

  1. Open the collection.
  2. Find the post you want to remove.
  3. Click on the "Remove from Collection" button.

Likes and Favorites

How do I like a post?

Click on the heart icon below the post to like it.

How do I add a post to favorites?

Click on the bookmark icon below the post to add it to your favorites.

Where can I find my favorite posts?

Your favorite posts are available in the "Favorites" tab in your profile.

Interacting with Other Users

How do I leave a comment on a post?

  1. Open the post.
  2. Click on the "Add a comment" field.
  3. Enter your comment.
  4. Click on the "Send" button.

How do I reply to a comment?

  1. Click on the comment you want to reply to.
  2. Click on the "Reply" button.
  3. Enter your reply.
  4. Click on the "Send" button.

Can I block other users?

Yes, you can block other users. To block a user, open their profile and click on the "Block" button.

Technical Support

How do I contact technical support?

Click on the "Contact Us" button in the app settings. We will respond to your request as soon as possible.

What should I do if I forget my password?

Click on the "Forgot Password?" link on the login screen and follow the instructions in the email.

Security

How secure is Snapstock?

We use modern encryption technologies to protect your data.

Community Guidelines

Main rules:

  • Do not post offensive or inappropriate content.
  • Do not advertise without permission.
  • Respect copyright laws.
  • Be polite and respectful to other users.

We hope this FAQ was helpful! Enjoy using Snapstock!
